content: single_crochet repeat 6 times 12 single_crochet stuff the head a little bit more make a knot cut the yarn with scissors but leave a long enough tail thread the yarn end through a yarn needle and gather the final stitches by weaving the needle through the front loop of each stitch around the gap pull tightly to close and fasten_off take the left eye patch and sew it on with the left over light blue yarn see pictures beak start with orange cotton yarn to avoid a hole at the beginning of the body you need to start it with a double magic_ring round 1 4 single_crochet stitches 4 single_crochet round 2 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 2 times 6 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 2 times 8 single_crochet round 4 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 2 times 10 single_crochet end with a slip_stitch cut the yarn with scissors but leave a long enough tail fill the beak pin it on round 15 till 19 of the body directly under the eyes and sew it on with the leftover yarn ears make 2 use light blue cotton yarn start at the top of the ear to avoid a hole you need to start it with a double magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet stitches 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 2 times 8 single_crochet round 3 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 2 times 10 single_crochet round 4 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 2 times 12 single_crochet rdn 5 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 6 times 18 single_crochet 4 fasten_off leave a long enough tail fold the ear make it flat and shape it a bit round pin the ears on to side of the head on round 8 and 9 and sew them on with the leftover yarn fasten_off wings make 2 use blue cotton yarn to avoid a hole you need to start it with a double magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet stitches 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each stitch from last round 12 single_crochet round 3 1 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat 6 times 18 single_crochet round 4 1 single_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 24 single_crochet round 5 1 single_crochet in next 3 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 30 single_crochet round 6 1 single_crochet in next 4 stitches 2 single_crochet in next stitch repeat 6 times 36 single_crochet round 7 1 half_double_crochet in single_crochet 1/ 1 double_crochet in single_crochet 2/2 treble_crochet in single_crochet 3/1 treble_crochet 1 dtr 1 treble_crochet in single_crochet 4/ 2 treble_crochet in single_crochet 5/ double_crochet in single_crochet 6/ half_double_crochet in single_crochet 7/ end with a slipstitch in single_crochet 8 fasten_off leave a long enough tail pin the wings on the side of the body on
